content.detailedDescription: I was in my bathroom smoking a cigarette when someone set off fireworks and i looked out the window.  i noticed a massive bright round fluorescent orange light clear the tree tops and apartment buildings.  i did not know right away what it was but then i thought it must be a ufo based on the strange movements.  it changed directions in a strange manner, not making a turn, more like a 90 degree angle.  it hovered for a minute and then started to move slowly.  i was over excited (adrenalin rush) and started babbling and yelling for my husband to come and look.  we went out the front door and watched the circle fly away slowly, too large and low to be a plane or helicopter.  the object made no noise.  the item just slowly flew out of our visibility.  i called out to my mother in law to come downstairs so i could tell her what we just witnessed. we noticed an aircraft flying fast in the sky right after the object left, but the plane was flying in a different direction.
content.summary: Bright orange circle cleared tree line hovered and slowly flew away

content.detailedDescription:
i have a celestron 8" schmidt-cesegrain and 80 mm 20 power binoculars and have been a serious sky watcher with those tools over 40 years. 
  i saw a bright object coming from close to the moon as bright as
the international space station which i watch whenever predicted but traveling at a much higher speed.  i would estimate it to be three times iss 1 speed.  it was the fastest satelite type of point of light i've ever seen as in passsed directly overhead from wsw 255 degrees and dissapeared withoud much diming ne at 80 degrees. it, if it were a normal satalite it should have dimed as it crossed the meridian which would have been at about 50 degrees in altitude from my place end time.  this only barely dimmed as the atmosphere thickened with the lower angles of it's progression.  i wasn't able to time it unfortunatly but it was sure fast.                                                                        as soon as it dissapeared into the tree line i went in the house and marked the time as i always do when seing something.  i later tracked three normal satelites. does anyone have an idea as to what the exceptionally fast light could be?  you may communicate directly with me at my gmail above please.   i don't think there is anything i havn't seen, including a black triangle 4-22-08 at 21:57, but nothing like this.  on the triangle i astoundingly found 5 other witn4esses 5 years after my solo experience.  the light of 7-4-18 i have recently discovered could be called an uap or unidenttified aerospace phenomenen, there is an organization for that. i tried without success to report the event to them. where else could i discuss this or report it?
content.summary: Sighted light as brite as iss 1 7-4-14 at 22:12 when the web site had no sighting predicted

content.detailedDescription: I was watching fireworks and was now walking home i first noticed the object becueas i was trying to see mars which the object looked close to i though it aas a star the object i observed was wight about the size of a penny high up and rapidly deceded banking left toword the ground leaveing a bright white trail i lost sight of the object suddenly near the tree line my reaction was that it might be a flare but it moved far to fast to be a flare an dit lasted longer than any fire work i had seen
content.summary: Object was bright white flighing in a arch

content.detailedDescription:
My fianc�� and i were sitting on the railroad tracks behind his apartment complex, talking and enjoying the night sky and fireflies.  after some time i noticed an extremely bright, orange-red light in the sky. i pointed it out to my fianc��e, asking him, "what the hell kind of plane is that??"

it was moving very quickly. much faster than a commercial aircraft. it made no sound at all.  there were no blinking lights. it was a solid red, circular light. the brighteness and intensity of the light was something brother of us have ever seen before.   we were unable to record it with our iphones because it only showed up as a small red dot which didn't accurately portray what we were seeing.  it was flying low. there was no distinct outline other than a very bright glowing light.  we watched it move across the sky until it was out of sight.  

within a few minutes, multiple fast moving aircraft were seen flying in the same direction as the unidentified object flew.  

shortly after that, we again saw a large bright red light moving across the sky at a rapid speed , but this time at a much higher altitude.

we both were left saying "either we just saw an experimental military craft of some kind, or that was a ufo."
content.summary: Sighting

content.detailedDescription: This is not the first time i have seen object's since i have lived here in orange city. this happened at around 10:00pm and i was just out having a smoke when i saw these and i thought to myself i need to tell someone beside's my mother who did not get to see them . i saw at first these orange object's that had a triangle shape at first and they where orange in color and then they would go in and out ( the color) . they where bright orange then they where faded to not even being there and then they would come back but they did it slow and i have never seen anything like this before it bothered me a lot and i had to tell you about it because it kept me up all night and it is today still bothering me and i just can not explain it. i saw 3 other objects in formatation flying low and making no noice at all they where heading from the west to the east i ran into the house to get my camera and to get my mother to show them to her i was only in the house for 10 to 12 seconds and when i came back out they where no where to be found and i had a very good view of the sky so i don't know where they went to. they made no sound and so that is something else that made no sence. i when bac k out to see if there where anymore to be seen and after about 35 to 40 minute's i saw another one of the shaped objects coming at me from the south i had my camera with me and as soon as i took a few  picture's it started to fade in and out and then while i was watching it it just disappeared it went no where it just was not there anymore and the funny thing is that i looked at my pictures and there was nothing on them so how is this possible ? i have seen some very weird things since i have been living here about 2 weeks ago i was out having a smoke as always i always look up to see what might be there and i normally see how many plane's pass over and on this night at about 10:30 or 11:00 pm i saw a light that just appeared out of no where it was just there a light very bright white it slowly came on and i mean it was bright white about 5 to 10 thousand feet and it slowly came on and then it slowly went out and then about 10 to 15 seconda later it came on very slowly again about looking at the sky from my point of view about 40 to 50 miles down range futher then the first time and it did the same thing . i went to take a better look at it from a better place a more clear place and it just was not there never again it just was gone and i was in the military  i built helicopters and planes mostly helicopters but i know what i am looking at and this was nothing i have ever seen before or since and it was and still is bothering me a lot and so that is why i am telling this too you because i have to let someone know what is going on around here. i see these type's of thiongs every once in awhile i am not looking for them like i told you i am out having a smoke and i look up to see how many planes are in the sky just to see how things are going in the airline industry to see if people can even afford to fly anymore and that is when i see these objects and believe me i did not believe in this stuff before but now after seeing these things i am starting to change my mind i mean what could these objects be because as far as i know we do not have things flying that can do things like these objects can do well not as far as i know anyway. i would like to know what these objects could be or are and thought you could help me out . can you? there may be other things i forgot to tell you but that is only because i was so confused up after seeing these objects that i might have forgotten somethings but this is the closest i can remember about what i saw but if i remember anything else i will let you know and if i see anymore of these objects again i will let you know that also if you need me too. i never thought that i would be telling you or anyone else about seeing these objects but it has been bothering me a lot for the last few years so i just had to say something. i started watching your show about ufo's after seeing these objects and to be honest i thought yea right but now i just don't know what to think anymore. i hope you can help me out with this and i hope i have helped mufon out by letting you know about what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Very bright orange and yellow. there where 6 all together and 3 where not solid they where shape's and the other 2 where solid round in formation

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were returning from a firework show in our boat and looked up and saw an orange / red light floating across the lake for about 3 minutes until it disappeared. it was not a firework, as it was floating horizontally
we were all very surprised. i have pictures but it will not let me attach them below.
content.summary: Some family and myself were returning from a firework show in our boat and looked up and saw an orange/red light floating across the lake.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching fireworks and saw a bright red light and figured it was an airplane.  i suddenly noticed it wasn't getting any closer or further away.  i grabbed my cell phone and tried to videotape it, it was very dark outside and had a hard time with seeing if it was showing up on the video.  standing on a chair i tried to get it on video.  i finally, after about 2-3 minutes, decided i could probably see it much better from the backyard.  sure enough, i could see it!  i told my son to grab his phone and get on the trampoline and video tape it.  as he was taping i was watching it, it was a bright red light with blinking green lights.  when the fireworks would get too close to it, it would hover down and to the right so that it was behind a tree branch and i could barely see the red light between the branches.  when a firework would go off to the right, it would hover back up and over to the left.  it was able to move straight up and down and also at angles, and pretty quickly at that.  after about 5 minutes or so, it just descended sharply and it never came back.  i was in and out of the house for about another hour and  never saw it again.  i'll be watching for it tonight, very curious to find out what it was!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: While watching fireworks saw a bright red light hovering

content.detailedDescription: I saw the object afterwards in photos taken on the beach at spanish point in county clare. it appeared in the photos and i did not see it in real time. it appears to travel from one end of the beach to the other and i noticed from the sequence of how the photos were taken it seemed to come closer to where i was standing on the beach very near the water. it does not appear in all the photos taken during the time therefore i don't believe it was a camera issue and i've never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Hovering green orb

content.detailedDescription: I was at work on break sitting outside while in the eye of a storm at about 12:25 am. looking west over the highway i could see what i first thought was lighting, but it was flashing over and over again in a stationary position with no thunder a little over a mile away. it did this for about three minutes and abruptly stopped.
content.summary: Lightning-like flashes in the same spot, no thunder.

content.detailedDescription: Took the family to the long island ducks firework show.  driving home my wife says, now thats a ufo!  we (self 49, wife, 45, and twin boys 8, ) all witnessed a bright rising glowing fireball in the eastern sky almost directly above us.  we pulled over to try to get better view.  i inadvertently took a picture of it quite off in the distance before video taping it.  it moved erratically.  not a straight path.  very jagged like as it moved through the night.  it was very bright, fireball is perfect.  we watched it till it was on the horizon and out of sight.  however when i took the picture, and zoom in on it, you can clearly see a dome top with intense flames emanating from under it with a clear dome and what looks like an appendage on top of it.  the fact that the ufo was far away from us with the naked eye, the fact that when you enlarge it, there is amazing detail can only mean that this object was very large.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fireball rising into sky making no noise.  bright glowing

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting outside preparing to watch the fire works a triangular object flew above out house. as i looked up it was traveling maybe 10 mph with no sound. i ran into the house to get my video camera and began video tapeing the object. the distance from when i first witnessed it to when i started filming doubled. i have about 4 minutes of video. i tapped a lot more but kept the files that were the best.

my wife had someone at work tell her the same story who was located 2 miles away. several people appear to have witnessed the event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4th of july

content.detailedDescription: While watching tiger base ball wrap up on tv, and watching local neighborhood fire works outside, i noticed what i thought was an airplane flying above the trees to the west of my location. it approached from the southwest and turned slowly to the north. i noticed it because the anti collision lights didn't look normal, not blinking any white light, just a constant red. the speed of the light was about that of a small plane. then a second light from the same direction showed up. it too turned north in trail with first light. the first light exited at a very high rate of speed and gained altitude to the northwest. as i returned my attention to the second light, a third light approached from the direction as the first, and it too turned north. the second also exited to the northwest, but gained altitude faster than first as it penetrated some high-level clouds that the first went under. the third light did pretty much as the others, but it too penetrated the high level clouds. the fourth light approached from the south west, but i didn't observe the direction it exited as some neighbors distracted my gaze. and when i returned to look where i thought it should be it was gone. during this time, i did see a small airplane flying in an easterly direction, north of my location; there is an airport nearby.
content.summary: Saw four red lights in trail in night sky .

content.detailedDescription:
The area park across from city hall, in snellville, ga, was packed full of people enjoying a variety of food vendors, bands, and festivities, before the crowning event fireworks display a little later in the evening. i was standing in line to buy an ice cream when i noticed something out of the corner of my eye. looking up, i saw two red glowing orbs moving very slowly towards us. there was no sound - although if there were, i probably wouldn���t have heard it above the music ��� just a gentle pulse of warm light. i asked the boy in front of me what he thought they were and he just shrugged. the orbs then stopped and just hung in the sky for a couple of minutes and then, moments later, the two objects took off in the direction from which they came at what seemed to be warp speed because in a millisecond they had become just two tiny points of light before disappearing. i���m not sure if anyone else saw them or not as i didn���t see anyone else besides myself and the boy looking up.
these orbs were identical to orbs i saw just over a year ago from my house in snellville. at that time, 10 or 12 orbs passed behind my house; they seemed fairly low in the sky, because they were not above the tree line. the color and size were exactly the same. as they travelled, one right after the other, there was no sound, and they followed in a perfect trajectory. then as they all passed by house, one after the other, they took off at an incredibly fast speed, at about a 45-degree angle, becoming points of light before disappearing. 
both times, i felt completely honored to have been witness to something that was, quite obviously, not from here.
content.summary: Red glowing orbs over snellville, ga on july 4th, 2014

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i sitting on deck. out of corner of rt eye saw bright red light moving slowly west to east. then the first pair followed, a minute later second pair in exact same position. a minute later a single red light followed and went out before we lost sight of it behind trees. no sound. husband john watched through binoculars and said it looked like (individual light) multiple lights moving randomly inside a transparent red-orange round object. each was identical to others. pairs appeared as one slightly above and forward in relation to the other. we quickly eliminated airplane lights since they didn't blink and there was only one color. i took video with my phone, quality is not great. you can see them however. i was very excited to see this as i am a ufo believer and this was my first sighting. my husband who is very skeptical, was intrigued enough to watch the entire episode through binoculars (i tried but could not see well with them.). i keep running the episode through my mind. we also ruled out chinese lanterns due to the exacting pattern of the lights.
content.summary: Red star-like, each of 2pair moved slowly, moved at exact time to other like were connected. 1 object, then 1 pr., 2nd pr., last was a single light, slowly went out.We

content.detailedDescription: Looking north saw 2 objects heading west same direction speed altitude about 150 to 200 ft up  at 11:45pm july 4 2014 in murphysboro illinois 2nd object was 1 minute later
content.summary: 2 orange-ish objects heading west no sound

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch watching fireworks when i pointed out to the 15/20 people here what appeared to be a bright light (appeared to be a star) we watched as it hovered in the same place for five minutes before the object began to move downward at a slow decent, after about 30 seconds it stopped and hovered again for about twenty minutes then made a very fast dive and stopped well short of the ground made a extremely fast eastward turn and streaked across our line of view and out of sight. total sighting lasting about 30 minutes and cell video taken did not show the object. there was a storm that had just passed and the cloud ceiling was at about 1000 ft above sea level. there were chinese lanterns in the sky all night so we could observe wind pattern which made the paper lanterns fly in an opposite direction, and light source in lanterns was obviously fire whereas the object was a constant brightness although it was seen by others to change colors (i am colorblind and did not notice the change). i watched the object the whole time as i thought it looked out of place with there being no stars due to the cloud cover.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering light with ascending and descending movements and a sharp fast right turn, lasted about 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was at home outside having a tea and smoke. i looked up and saw a large stationary silver orb with 4 smaller orbs at it's right side. 1 orb was flying between the other 3 with precise movement,up down-round-in-out with slow velocity.I thought this is not normal and second thought was..,they're back... as above,this was it's track,hovering with 1 orb maneuvering in and out of the other 3.I was excited/shocked/nervous,during and after for some time.I ran to get my camera and took 5 quick shots. the objects (5) disappeared to nothing/gone in an eye blink. checked my camera and there was nothing on it....? i have seen these objects twice after 1st incident in the last 3 weeks. my roommate also witnessed the 2nd sighting and was blow'n away and checks the same sky location on a daily basis, weird.
content.summary: 1 large orb with 4 small orbs at it's right side. 1 orb moved around other 3.

content.detailedDescription: I was about eight years old, in the family vegetable garden alone. my attention was attracted to two shining discs at about 3000-5000 feet altitude. they were in formation, side by side about 300 feet apart, approaching at high speed from the south. they made a sharp 90 degree turn to the west just before they got overhead. they left the area, still side by side at the same elevation, possibly descending slightly. the entire incident lasted about 15 seconds. at that time i had never heard the word "flying saucer", or ufo. i never reported because i did not think anyone was interested or that the data would be useful.
content.summary: Two shining discs overflew an eight year old boy in midafternoon on cloudless day in northwest arkansas

content.detailedDescription: I am writing this on behalf of my daughter... my daughter and her boyfriend were taking pictures of the oncoming storm clouds. they noticed a flat disc shaped object that was traveling to the west. it was illuminated by the setting sun. it was white appearing and looked like two contact lenses. they were not afraid but curious as to what it was. it went into a cloud but did not reappear.
content.summary: Taking pictures of storm clouds the object was like 2 contact lenses on top of one another. the object flew into a cloud and did not reappear as expected.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting?  

sunday evening, june 8, 2014 around 7 pm (pre-dusk).  my wife and i had two guests over for dinner.  we were on the back porch of our farm house.  although the sky was slightly overcast we were able to see clearly into the distance.

our farmhouse back porch runs north & south.  we were seated at the south end of the porch and i was on the chair facing south.  at one point, i looked up and saw a bright orange orb in the distance.  i instantly alerted the others to follow me to the lawn where we could better see what this was.  it was obvious that the fire ball was heading our way.  i can't say how far away it was but i can give a good idea how big it was to my eye.  if i extended my arm out in front of me and separate my thumb and forefinger, 3/8" to 1/2" that would indicate the visual size.

the fire ball, as i first thought of it, was round with no tail whatsoever even though it was moving quickly through the atmosphere.  i later compared it to the tip of a hot poker heated to a glowing orange with a yellow, maybe even yellow/white center.  to my eye, the perimeter was not smooth.  what i saw was a flame-like pattern at the edge which was tight like teeth of a circular saw blade.  i saw no movement of the edge pattern which i would expect from a fire ball in earth's atmosphere.

the object continued in a straight line from south to north.  no doubt, it must have been larger now but it didn't seem to be significantly larger than when i first saw it.  again, it was impossible to judge how far away it was from us.  what we saw must have been a solid craft of some sort to perform in this manner.  we all agreed that it was moving faster than most airplanes but it was completely silent and was certainly not an airplane.

soon, it was far off to the north.  it seemed further away from us now than when i first saw a small medium grey sphere with, as i recall,  a thin, dark, horizontal line where the equator on a globe would be.  i also recall two tiny lights towards the bottom of the sphere spaced out towards the outer edge.  i am a little vague about the lights but i still think i saw them.  it also occurred to me that the grey disk could have been a retinal after image.  the horizontal line and possible blinking lights make me trust that this was not a retinal trick.  i was able to watch the disk continue in the same direction  for 5 to 10 seconds until it seemed to go into the light grey clouds and disappear.

to use my extended arm measure again, the fire ball must have been much smaller now because when it suddenly disappeared and the disk was there in its place, the disk seemed to be about the same size as the fire ball but now it was little more than 1/8" by my estimation when it became invisible. 

my wife and i saw a similar fire ball when returning home from the movies one night last fall in the early evening.
content.summary: Four of us see fire ball approaching from s/w. continues to n/e in 5 minutes. at n/e position, becomes a grey orb.  disappears into cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside watching the last fireworks with my fiance. i looked up to see a mortar going off and noticed a bright orange light about a mile or so to the south. i thought it was a plane at first,but i noticed how slow it was moving. then i thought maybe a satellite, but the light from it was too bright. it slowly moved north toward us, then rapidly turned west south west. it then changed color to a bright white, then back to orange. it blinked twice, then went behind a palm tree and didn't come out the other side. about 10 minutes later we noticed it again coming up the same path from the south, this time moving faster. it then slowed to a stop and hovered for about 1 min. it then went back along the same path it came and first went semi-dark, then it disappeared; like it was invisible. i tried to catch a video of it but only caught a glimpse before my phone freaked out and shut off. me and my fiance looked for it for another 30 min or so but didn't see it again. we were like wow, did that just happen. i will post the video soon once i get on a computer.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange light came north then. rapidly turned south and blinked out. came back after 10 min and hovered for 1 min then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: When me and my family were walking back to the car after the fourth of july houston fireworks show. we were walking back to the car when i looked to my left and saw a seemingly small red glowing round object that was falling like a leaf. my mom dismissed it as a leftover firework, but i heard no boom or crack so i knew at first that it was a ufo. at first it just hovered at 45 degrees above the horizon for half a second, the its started falling down slowly like a leaf. i could not see it anymore when a distant tree blocked it out of my sight. i again like my last sighting very excited because i am very interested in extraterrestrials and also it was my second sighting this year. i would also lastly like to say that about 20 minutes after the sighting, i felt sore on the sides of my body above the waist.
content.summary: Falling red object in the sky after 4th of july finaly

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was july 4, 2014 and i was watching crazy local fireworks show in a neighborhood in gardena, ca.  i was looking out my kitchen window at the fireworks everywhere (aka like a war was going on).  i noticed a round orange colored, fireball-like, glowing object in the sky.  it looked to be as high as a helicopter or higher...Object looked pretty far away.  it hovered for approximately 3-5 minutes in the sky on the outskirts of the fireworks.  i thought this was very strange.....Then just disappeared.  it was between 10pm-11pm.  i first thought it was a firework but it was neither ascending nor descending.  it just stayed in the same spot.  i then thought, could this be a ufo.  i could figure no other explanation for the light and have never seen anything like it before.  the object just disappeared, no fading out, just gone!
content.summary: During 4th of july firework shows

content.detailedDescription: Traveling in car heading south, took photo of sunrise, did not see the object until viewing the image later.
content.summary: Orb of light caught while taking photo of sun rise

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Eagan watching fireworks,

it was a bright light in the dark but my family and i were the only ones who noticed it,

a helicopter,

two lights and it was hovering for a while, then it move fast behind a building then appeared and descended and ascended many times,

awed,

it disappeared behind some trees,
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moved fast, than made frequent stops then descended and assended

content.detailedDescription:
20+ witnesses within 100 yds and multiple city wide reports.
from the eastern slope of green mountain, we witnessed 2 groups of lights. the most suspicious group was ene of our location, approximately immediately south of dia. this was a group of 4. they maneuvered up/down/left/right for at least 5 minutes. they would change formation, but typically would return to a string of 3 with a 4th that would maneuver around them. from my research i discovered an excellent example of some of this maneuvering that was recorded on 5/11 and posted to youtube. this video is narrated in spanish and says that it is from denver. these objects finally winked out moving north to south.
the second group of 5 lights appeared to be over westminster. they descended and circled. they appeared to land. this group may very well have been parachutists that were reported to be performing in the area for a fireworks show. their movements could be similar to descending parachutists that were doing acrobatics. i mention this to clarify that there were 2 distinct groups of lights and to clarify the differences between the 2. 
i am reporting this because it is the 2nd time that i have seen these lights. last year on the 4th of july, we also saw the lights in the location of dia. these lights chased each other, moved radically in all directions, appeared to land/crash (very rapud descent) and ascend. this lasted 5 to 10 minutes, maybe more. it was long enough that we got bored watching them and went back and forth from watching them to watching the fireworks.
since both events occured on the 4th of july, i will clarify that these objects were most definitely not fireworks. we saw an incredible amount of fireworks during both events and these objects were distinctly different.
i am by nature a skeptic and cynic. i was a member of the us navy attached to an air squadron. i am familiar with flight characteristics both normal and extreme that can be performed by aircraft.  these were incredible events worthy of note.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 groups of ufo's over denver during fireworks

content.detailedDescription: I was watching fireworks over an elementary school, and was on the look out for lights in the sky that were unrelated to the fireworks. i saw an orange red circle travel across the sky in a straight line, not blinking or flashing. i saw this happen in the same path a total of four times in ten minutes. i also saw the same thing, only further away, traveling in the same direction. i only lost sight of the object when it traveled too far away to see. i had seen a couple of planes fly over before i noticed the circles, and the planes all had multiple flashing lights on them and were much bigger. i was excited to see something unusual, the thought of seeing an extraterrestrial craft was amazing!
content.summary: Straight line path, orange red circle during fireworks displays.

content.detailedDescription: There were 6 discs one came close to my truck followed me for about 4 minutes and bright light like a tube from middle of disc and it joined other discs and disappeared in to the sky in seconds.
content.summary: Driving on higway at night

content.detailedDescription: I was attending the dublin, ohio 2014 fourth of july fireworks display with my daughter and the family of her friend, including her friend's mother.  we were set up in a grassy area outside the dublin coffman high school stadium.  it was exceptional weather for july 4th--cool, very clear, with just enough breeze to move the smoke from the fireworks away.  a while after the fireworks began @10pm, perhaps 15 minutes in, i heard the friend's mother who was seated next to me say "what is that?"  i'm unsure whether the mother or her daughter were the first to notice the object, or really why they did, since it was a full 180-degrees opposite the fireworks we were watching, and required turning one's back to the display.  when i turned around, it was very easy to see the object.  i immediately realized it was nothing one normally sees in the sky.  the moon was at about 1/4 fullness, and was above the object in the sky.  the object (if i understand elevation correctly as 90 degrees straight overhead) was at about 45-50 degrees in the sky, beneath the moon.  a few stars were visible and relative to the object, much smaller lights. the object was not a single point of light but clearly had dimension and definition of a round to oval shape.  if you held your fingers up to the sides, it would have appeared to be about 3/8-inch across.  it was not possible to say how distant it was, but it seemed relatively close--much closer than a high-altitude jet would look, for instance.  as we continued to look at the object, it clearly was stationary--there was no movement whatsoever.  i have lived in the past under the approach path for port columbus airport, and am very familiar (say, one plane about every 25 seconds day and night) of what conventional aircraft look like when approaching from assorted angles in the sky--this was nothing like that.  i am also aware of the phenomena of an aircraft approaching you in a direct line appearing to be stationary for a time--but they do eventually move, normally look like a point of light, and the lights normally appear clear white to bluish-white.  i also used to live blocks from a police heliport and within a couple miles of two hospitals with medical transport helicopters and have seen those in flight countless times.  this was also nothing like that.  additionally, the goodyear blimp, and those of other companies, make regular visits to the area, especially during osu football season--this was no blimp.  i would also emphasize that the object was opposite the area where the fireworks display was occurring, and no sparks or other burning material from the pyrotechnics were in that area of the sky.  also, there are often small planes noticeable in the sky during fireworks shows--i know what those look like too, and this was nothing like that.  the most curious aspect to me was the color:  the object uniformly glowed an unwavering distinct pumpkin-orange--rather like a chinese lantern that is lit from within.  (my bemused mental image of the object now is a floating lit pumpkin--an uncarved jack-o-lantern.)  unlike aircraft, there were no other lights of any color, nor was there any blinking.  also, again, there was not a light on the object, rather the entire object was lighted.  i have a sense that there may have been faint darker lines in the surface, but that perception is a little vague.  those of us looking at it turned away to speak to each other a couple times, and turned back.  this was over the space of 1-2 minutes.  (it was a little distracting, since the fireworks display we'd intended to watch was going on during this and we couldn't look at both).  so, turning back and forth, after a brief time we tuned back and there was no sign of it.  it was just gone.  except for lower-hanging smoke from the fireworks, the sky was clear.  the only accounting for it disappearing would be if enough smoke had drifted up to cover it, but it didn't seem to be quite high enough to do that.  once it vanished, the mother said "we've seen a ufo." and, since i can't explain what we saw, i guess we did.  we were making jokes that they'd come to see the fireworks, that we'd have grey visitors later that night, etc.  our main emotional reaction was curiosity and interest, and perhaps amusement--nothing upsetting.  the major aftermath for me is a mystified irritation, as having read and seen recorded accounts of ufos for literally decades, i am dumbfounded that i sat there with my camera in a tote at my feet, and never thought to reach down for it and attempt a photo.  what was i thinking?  i'm left shaking my head, as this was the most distinct exposure i've had to a craft i cannot explain and i cannot account for my utter lack of alertness to realize this was something i might want to try to record.  i'll be interested to know if there are other reports from the evening of similar sighting.
content.summary: Object observed beneath moon opposite july 4th fireworks.  pumpkin-colored glowing motionless.  disappeared.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Eagan watching fireworks,

it was a bright light in the dark but my family and i were the only ones who noticed it,

a helicopter,

two lights and it was hovering for a while, then it move fast behind a building then appeared and descended and ascended many times,

awed,

it disappeared behind some trees,
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moved fast, than made frequent stops then descended and assended
